website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you want an eye mask that can also be used as a sleep mask, though it's fairly uncomfortable when used without the silk cover.
pros: A versatile eye mask with eye holes that doubles as a sleep mask – gel mask can be used heated or cooled, by itself, or with the silk cover that comes with it
cons: Mask doesn't have a fabric side, and is a bit stiff when used cold
Some users gripe about rough edges that can be felt when used by itself

customer_reviews.title: Works for keeping the light out, BUT it ruined my bedding
customer_reviews.text: The mask itself is super soft & keeps the morning light out. However, the dye that was used bled all over my white pillow cover which was a huge disappointment. I have also had issues with the strap. If I wear it where just comfortably sits over my eyes it falls off pretty easily, then if I wear it tighter I can feel the tension across my face which isn't the most comfortable. The blue cooling is fun and feels nice, but the straps aren't the greatest either
customer_reviews.author: Jaicelle

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My wife had trouble sleeping because she goes to bed a lot earlier than I do and I like to watch TV or work on projects while shes going to sleep. Since getting these, shes asleep within 5 minutes of putting them on. They relax her so now noise doesnt even bother her and they're very comfortable and block out all the light. A lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Lack of product consistency
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two masks and they are very different. For the cooling/heat gel mask, one is a comfortable/softer plastic, while the other is stiff and digs into the eyes. We received a package of ear plugs with each eye mask, but one package only contained one ear plug, not two. The straps for the gel mask were also different. One contained a longer strap with an adjustable band, and the other came with two smaller bands, but not adjustable. Will be returning the products.
customer_reviews.author: Myra S Dyer

customer_reviews.title: no structure leads to eye pressure
customer_reviews.text: The fabric has pilled up and frayed a bit. I wish it had a bit more structure, more rigidity. It creases horizontally, particularly if you have the strap too tight, and causes pressure on my eyes. It has to be worn with the strap entirely loose. Although it would probably decrease the cooling properties, it might be nice if the cooling pad was chambered, I have to squish it around to get the gel evenly distributed every night. Its also a bit small, lots of light leaking in near my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Kaijin

customer_reviews.title: I’m really not sure if this is helping me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m really not sure if this is helping me to sleep or not. I still have to drink Sleepy Time Tea at night. One reason, I give this a 3 Star is because the black mask discolors my pillow cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reducing puffiness and redness, and also just a great plain old sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: Love! I like that the gel insert can be removed and you can still use the black mask part by itself without the insert. I also love the gel part to put in the refrigerator so that I can wear it on my face to reduce redness or swelling. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Runs4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The silk masksstrap was fine. It blocked the light like I had wanted it to, but when I slipped in the gel mask I couldn't feel anything. It's the gel mask the didn't fit right. It was nice and cool, but I couldn't wear it with the strap or it became too tight. I ended up just laying down and placing the mask on my eyes. Besides the gel strap, product worked nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ayla mcloughlin

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cool silk
customer_reviews.text: What a nice sleep mask. Strap is adjustable with a thin plastic clip. So far the clip hasn't been noticeable when I'm asleep. Hope to get a lot of use from this. Edit: still going strong for more than 18 months. Love how I can hand-wash it quickly, hang it up, and it's dry and fresh every night. Had to put new straps myself on the freezy mask though. It was way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Stormlaughter

customer_reviews.title: Depends how you want to use it
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to be able to use this product casually while reading or doing anything because of the face strap. However, the metal ends of the straps that go through the mask make the sides of the mask dig into your skin and is very uncomfortable. It can only be worn when you are laying flat on your back or inside the black eye covering which isn't ideal because I wanted to see when I used them....pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: @Laceyy7

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: the sleep mask is so soft and total blacks out any light. the gel mask is a little weird sitting on your face. you have to let it unfreeze for a long time before you can use it and then it doesn't stay cold for long
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: its very comfortable. Right out of freezer is too cold. But in the fridge it is perfect 👌
customer_reviews.author: Dess

customer_reviews.title: Great for headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I ordered this product sooner. I suffer from chronic headaches and this mask is perfect for giving me some relief. It’s very soft, blocks out light, and putting the mask on the freezer really helps with the pain. A great product
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Burnett

customer_reviews.title: sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Have not used the cold/hot mask yet. Will update when I do. I'm sure it will work fine. I use it when my sinus' are bothering me. I sleep much better with the mask over my eyes though.
customer_reviews.author: Nana In Florida

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep mask I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the ice pack part but the actual sleep mask is very soft and the adjustable strap is great. It is kind of pricey but it’s great
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: I like this item as it is as described. I haven't had a migraine yet but I have used it for sinus pressure relief. This is a good quality item. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly stiff
customer_reviews.text: This one is hard to keep molded over my eyes, I generally have to hold it in place. Still beats using a spoon though
customer_reviews.author: Travis Fennel

customer_reviews.title: I work third shift and thought these would help for sleeping during the day during the summer cause its brighter outside harder to fall asleep and this is awesome. Super soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First time using one of these. I work third shift and thought these would help for sleeping during the day during the summer cause its brighter outside harder to fall asleep and this is awesome. Super soft and comfortable. Wish I would have gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The cool ice mask is so soothing after a long day! It has helped me sleep so much! The material is silky smooth!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable to wear, except where the strap touched the ears, that gets a little irritated at night. Gaps a little at the bottom allowing some light to still get in. The gel insert is amazing though! Overall not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Works for me at 31
customer_reviews.text: This frozen eye mask saves my looks on nights I can’t sleep as an insomniac. Now, no one can tell when sometimes my only give away was my bags and puffiness under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: John Honsinger

customer_reviews.title: I work nights, so I was looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I work nights, so I was looking for a blackout mask to use while I sleep during the day. Impressed with the gel pack. Stayed cooler than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C.

customer_reviews.title: Product works, no surprises.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly as promised, eye mask is comfy and tight and blocks out the light, so A+ on that. The cold mask, put it in the fridge. If you put it in the freezer, it'll freeze solid and not adhere to your face. If you want a cheap eye mask, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: blue10speed

customer_reviews.title: When frozen does not lay comfortable on eyes
customer_reviews.text: I suggest putting in frig not freezer. When frozen does not lay comfortable on eyes. Otherwise worked for migraine relief.
customer_reviews.author: Gooniebetty34

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Returning it doesn't fit at all and the gel mask was faulty waste of time should have read the reviews first
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: relaxation
customer_reviews.text: Great mask and it helps so much at night with relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Fisher-Bella

customer_reviews.title: Tightness can be easily adjusted and it’s padded.
customer_reviews.text: It fits great, keeps the light out almost completely, especially at the nose which has been trouble in the past with other masks.
customer_reviews.author: Soni

customer_reviews.title: mask is great! ice pack...not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason it got 4 and not 5 is because the ice pack doesn’t really mold to your face well. Mask is very nice ! strap is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She has migraines and loves the mask for blocking out the light but the option to use the gel pack when she wants she says is amazing. She said she doesn't even have to put ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She has migraines and loves the mask for blocking out the light but the option to use the gel pack when she wants she says is amazing. She said she doesn't even have to put the gel pack into the fridge for a minimal cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Swashbuckling piddler

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love both masks! i put mine in the freezer and the sleeping mask is super soft and blocks out the light
customer_reviews.author: Laine

customer_reviews.title: Not a good "cool" mask
customer_reviews.text: Bought for cool gel insert. The mask becomes completely frozen when placed in freezer and does not mold to your face at all. When placed in fridge, the mask is barely cold for a very short amount of time. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: emmsers13

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay cold!
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad this is NOT a returnable item because it does not stay cold for more than 5 minutes! All it does is look cool and that's it..smh
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Winder

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: I love the gel insert that comes with this sleep mask. Without it, the mask gets really hot. I like to put the insert in the fridge for 10 minutes to make it extra cool. Great price for such a nice mask!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Fine. Shut out all the light and pretty easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: DeoDo

customer_reviews.title: The silk mask stays in place and the hot/cold gel ...
customer_reviews.text: The silk mask stays in place and the hot/cold gel mask is very helpful for both headaches and pampering yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Managhan

customer_reviews.title: great,  good idea.
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes it as mask. Has not use cooling pad. She has used it nightly since getting it. likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dr DJ

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 stars because it's cute...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but what good does it do if it only stays cold/cool for maybe 10 minutes at the most? Going to try freezing it...can't send it back because the packaging went out in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: bbkatt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask!! It's great for at home or when your on a trip. I just love how cool the mask gets!
customer_reviews.author: Yos

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Wonderful for migraine sufferers or for sleeping on a hot summer's night. However was very disappointed in the quality. Can get same thing at Walmart for less than half the price so expected better quality construction from these... stitching started coming apart after 2nd night.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: A great mask with or without the cooling pack
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time. A great mask with or without the cooling pack. The cooling pack is a little uncomfortable on the nose, but you only need to wear it for a few minutes. Keep in the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders! Silk mask is so smooth and comfortable. It hasn’t fallen off once so far. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Sleep Mask
customer_reviews.text: This sleep mask is the most comfortable of many I've tried over the years. It is silky and light and I can hardly tell I'm wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great mask but leaves marks
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mask till I noticed it was leaving black marks on my pillow cases :(
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Gifted
customer_reviews.text: I think the person liked it she said thank you but didn't really say anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandysue105

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I’m using my mask every night and enjoy it. It has a nice silky feeling.
customer_reviews.author: I. Romsa

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not quite right
customer_reviews.text: Like the cold mask quite a bit, but not thrilled with the silk mask. It feels great against the skin, however, I am needing a contoured sleep mask, not one that rubs against my eyes and doesn't block out all light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really helped me sleep
customer_reviews.text: I work graveyard shifts and don't have blackout curtains, so going to sleep is hard for me. I got this sleep mask and it has helped me sleep so much easier. It's really soft and comfortable, and the gel mask also helps. I use the sleep mask with the gel mask(when it's cold) and I don't feel as groggy when I wake up. I would really recommend people to get it if they are getting a sleep mask
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Mata

customer_reviews.title: Decent for heavy sleepers
customer_reviews.text: The mask has two different textures on each side. One was too silky and the other made my face sweat. Other than that it served its purpose. Would suggest for those who sleep heavily though.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The top of the Reusable Cold mask rests on your eyebrows and because the shape of the masks hits your nose and cannot touch the lower part of your eyes. You would do better taking a small plastic bag put a few ice cubes is the bag and place each bag on your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: terry beck

customer_reviews.title: Dyes it’s job
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleep mask. It helps me block out the excess like from chargers in my room or street lights. However, the black dye in the material STAINS EVERYTHING. I have dye marks all over my bed and the gel mask is nice but it freezes really hard rather than just staying a gel. Once it thaws a little it definitely feels good though
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! the mask is soft and compfortable. Cooling mask works great. I actually put it on my forhead the last time I had a headache and it felt so good.
customer_reviews.author: smeos

customer_reviews.title: The receiver liked it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for a present. The receiver said she used it the following night and it was a lifesaver after a rough day. Helped her go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: amazing item, truely love it and fast shipping with great service and will definitely buy soon
customer_reviews.author: Emily Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: The mask is very nice. It's soft and doze what a mask should ...
customer_reviews.text: The mask is very nice. It's soft and doze what a mask should do. The cold pack is a little hard and doesn't softly form to your face sale when it's cold. Other than that I am happy with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those relaxation nights
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a cute silk case and ear plugs. Perfect for those relaxation nights.
customer_reviews.author: Lana T

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear, the tightness can be adjusted and hold the adjustment just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Elena C.

customer_reviews.text: Mask helps with my sleep..cold mask helps the next day with the luggage under my eyes ;)
customer_reviews.author: yvette

customer_reviews.title: Handle with Care
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but started unravelling at the seams rather quickly
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. The silk fabric is very soft and smooth, the strap is adjustable and is comfortable to wear. This mask blocks all the light from the tv or a tablet, and about 95% of brighter light from lamps or the sun. And the cold pack is fantastic, worn alone or when placed inside the sleep mask, it's a tremendous help for headaches and hot flashes. You can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harding

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft the sleep mask is and how the size is adjustable. I use it every single night and it definitely helps with my quality of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: bean

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I did I ended up buying another one for ...
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews for different masks before purchasing and settled on this one. I’m so glad I did I ended up buying another one for my mom for part of her mother’s day present. It’s everything I wanted in a mask: silky, stays on my head while sleeping and blocks out all the light. Had become my favorite part of my bedtime ritual. And the eyelashes are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the night shift!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been working nights and even have black out curtains but still feel like it’s to light in my room so I thought get this mask would help and boy was I right!! I sleep like a baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Eid

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mask I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mask I have ever purchased! The insert makes using this mask like heaven. You can't go wrong with this one. Great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: he loved
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and the recipient opened it at the party and put the mask in the fridge immediately, he loved it
customer_reviews.author: S Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Well made item
customer_reviews.text: Veru comfortable and adjustable to fit anyone. Love the cooling gel insert.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri E.

customer_reviews.title: Almost golden...
customer_reviews.text: I would buy the mask again; however, I would buy earplugs elsewhere to block out sound. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: SkyPrincess71

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask. It fits as expected and material is a good quality. I use it cold to reduce puffyness so i like the outer part as a barrier making it not too cold directly on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie N

customer_reviews.title: I love this little guy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. I sleep so much better now. I do not recommend freezing the gel pack... but refrigeration is perfect. My significant other plays video games late into the night and I need to sleep by 11. So I put this on and I sleep wonderfully. It's been such a game changer for me these past two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sable

customer_reviews.title: Cute and the silk is great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and she absolutely loves it! Cute and the silk is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carol King

customer_reviews.title: Though the silk is nice its very thin and it has the worst attachment ...
customer_reviews.text: Though the silk is nice its very thin and it has the worst attachment which slips out and scratches skin. The band attachment is extremely cheap looking and uncomfortable. Wanted to like it. Not going to return it since I used it once, but have to create something to make it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Clark

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping mask! Silk feels great, not a lot of gaps for light to sneak through. Removable gel pack is nice. Both good quality. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: April Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product. The sleep mask is very opaque and rests on your eye lids (but it's silky and comfortable). As others have said, don't freeze the ice pack all the way (otherwise it will be hard to fit in the sleep mask).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I say don't freeze it. only put it in the refrigerator or it does not conform to your face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not mold and will break on skin!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it freeze solid (not moldable to face) it broke and I woke up with blue crust in my hair and my skin stained - it took over a day to wash away!
customer_reviews.author: jill peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: 30 min in the freezer and it leaked at the seams. It was great until that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Cooling gel eye mask
customer_reviews.text: The soft one has pure comfort and get one becomes little hard after some time apart from that every thing is perfect
customer_reviews.author: chandu

customer_reviews.title: A great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend who travels often and she just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for for my Eyes. Reduces Swelling.
customer_reviews.author: The Smart Prince

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: super cute great for a gift! i just wish the packaging was different!
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Soo good, my husband wants mine!
customer_reviews.text: It's soo good, my husband tries to steal it from me! I might have to order him one as well! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Love the mask
customer_reviews.text: Love the mask! It helps and I love the cold, I put in microwave for 10 sec and it put a hole in it, my fault though! So do not do that! Other than that it is great! I still use the cold when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Hon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a part of a gift and she loved it. The Gel mask works and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Febus

customer_reviews.title: blacks out perfectly, materials is very soft and light ...
customer_reviews.text: blacks out perfectly, materials is very soft and light, and you can adjust the size as you want. I haven't tried the gel mask yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mai. A

customer_reviews.title: The silk lining is very comfortable to sleep with though
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the cooling pack yet. The silk lining is very comfortable to sleep with though.
customer_reviews.author: wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Soft Silk Mask!
customer_reviews.text: The mask is great! I bought it to block light from my eyes when roommate shows up late in college. The material is excellent soft. I am sometimes a crazy sleeper (rolling over and turning) but they didn't even fall off or anything. So secure fit. It is so soft and nice on your eyes. The mask and ear plugs is a great combo for good night sleep! I recommend it to anyone who wants a sleep mask!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for blocking out light
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, fits well, stays on, blocks out the light and helps with migraines when using the ice insert. Exactly what I was looking for and I am extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JSchiavo

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Received timely. Looked to be good quality. Gave as a gift. Think she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L. Skorich

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love. Sad my dog ate them lol
customer_reviews.author: Beth C.

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: OMG I SLEEP WITH THIS EVERY NIGHT AND MAKE SURE IT'S WARM BEFORE I PUT IT ON MY EYES AND I SLEEP SO GOOD SO YES INDEED 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It leaked into my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: It was comfortable at first, but then it busted after owning it for less than a month. It leaked all in my eyes while I was sleeping! Not happy about that at all. I have no idea if that stuff made it behind my eyes, or if I got it all out.
customer_reviews.author: Davina Louise

customer_reviews.title: Helps most when I have migraines
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest sleep mask I have ever tried. I have chronic migraines and the insert has been such a benefit to have with hot/cold therapy. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Vetitoe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Exactly as shown. Good quality. Would reccomend to others.
customer_reviews.author: D Brad

customer_reviews.title: So Relaxing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does my fiance! We are going to buy a second one so we don't fight over it haha
customer_reviews.author: Holmes

customer_reviews.title: This is a 3. 5 rounded up.. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a 3.5 rounded up...the blue mask should be bigger for my big head.
customer_reviews.author: AmmoFul

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using mine for about 3 months now. I can't sleep without it. Given the price, I was pleasantly surprised with the quality and durability of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I work night shift and I needed it to sleep during the day. I love the insert in the freezer because it helps when I have a headache. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori McCasland

customer_reviews.title: Major key alert
customer_reviews.text: They don't want you to get a good nights sleep, so make sure you get one. With these
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: does not stay cold or hot long enough and sleep mask to thin and hot makes me sweat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Put in Microwave for 8 seconds and it popped before first use. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Keeps out all the light
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, soft, keeps out all light. Sometimes the elastic hurts behind my ears when I sleep with it on, but it's only minor.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would rather use a cold wash cloth. Doesnt mold to you face.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

product_meta.title: Fitglam Pure Silk Sleep Mask + Reusable Cold/Hot Therapy SPA Gel Eye Mask Set - Improve Sleeping, Alleviate Puffy, Swollen Eyes, Fatigue, Headache and Tension (Black with White Eyelashes & Gel)
feature_bullets: 100% Pure Mulberry Silk Sleep Mask + Bead Pearl Gel Eye Mask, can be used together or seperately.

BETTER SLEEP: A sleep aid and eye relaxer, the Fitglam sleep mask (blind fold) is made of 100% top quality 19mm Natural mulberry silk on BOTH sides. The super soft, super smooth mulberry silk is light weight, breathable and protein rich, which gives you total blackout, whether at home, in a hotel or on the plane.

BEAUTIFUL HEALTHY EYES: The Therapeutic Gel Eye Mask is made of eco-friendly, nontoxic condensate and purified water, sealed with cold resistant soft PVC with skin friendly matte finish. No unpleasant smell, safe for pregnant women and kids.

A UNIQUE GIFT: Comes with a Fitglam branded zip up matte finish PVC bag for easy storing and carrying. Just throw it into your bag and enjoy better sleep and eye spa anytime anywhere! Two moldex ear plugs included! A unique gift for anyone wanting deep, uninterrupted sleep and beautiful eyes!
PACKAGE: One piece of sleeping mask and one set of earplugs. The earplugs are located inside the carry pouch.
